p: All solvents used in reactions were dried and purified according to standard procedures. The progress of reaction was monitored by thin-layer chromatography (TLC) (silica gel 60 254F plates, Merck, Darmstadt, Germany). The chromatographic plates were developed in a mixture of hexane and ethyl acetate (3:2, v/ v) or chloroform and ethanol (15:1, v/ v). The spots were visualized by spraying them with a solution of 5% sulfuric acid and heating to 100 Â°C. The compounds were purified by column chromatography (silica gel 60, particle size < 63 m, Merck) in the solvent system indicated.
